EmailTemplate.description: Automated volunteer registration response for application who are homeless or hospitalized
EmailTemplate.name: Registration: Homeless/Hospitalized
EmailTemplate.subject: Encircle Volunteer Registration Follow-Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}!
Thank you for applying to be an Encircle volunteer. We would like to speak with you about your responses over the phone. Please email volunteer@encircletogether.org to schedule a date and time.
